F1 score.from sentence:
5 Results and Analysis 5.1 Character - to - word Models presents the performance of different character - to - word models on six benchmark datasets .
The result shows that for most of the datasets , the F1 score does not improve much when we directly add more layers .

proposed character - to - word model , c.from sentence: Our proposed character - to - word model , char - IntNet - 5 and char - IntNet - 9 generally improves the results across all datasets .

IntNet.from sentence: Our IntNet significantly outperforms other character embedding models , for example , the improvement is more than 2 % in terms of F 1 score for German and Dutch .

some accuracy drop.from sentence: We also observe some accuracy drop when we continuously increase the depth .

char - IntNet - 5.from sentence: Also , we observe that char - IntNet - 5 is more effective for learning character - to - word representations than char - IntNet - 9 in most of the cases .

residual connections.from sentence: Furthermore , we add residual connections to char - CNN - 9 as char - ResNet - 9 , which confirms that residual connections can help train deep layers .

We further improve char - ResNet - 9 by changing residual connections into dense connection blocks as char - DenseNet - 9 , which shows that the dense connections are better than residual connections for learning word shape information .

improves.from sentence: The improvement is more pronounced for non-English datasets , for example , IntNet improves the F - 1 score over the stateof - the - art results by more than 2 % for Dutch and Spanish .

our char - IntNet.from sentence:
Table 2 presents our proposed model in comparison with state - of - the - art results .
These experiments show that our char - IntNet generally improves results across different models and datasets .

of.from sentence: It also shows that the results of LSTM - CRF are significantly improved after adding character - to - word models , which confirms that word shape information is very important for sequence labeling .
